lessons.japanese: その言葉には微妙なニュアンスがある。
lessons.english: This word has a subtle nuance to it.

lessons.japanese: 彼女の考えと私の考えでは少しニュアンスが違う。
lessons.english: There's a slight difference between her thinking and mine.
